record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 3495 AND H.R. 3685
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 3495 AND H.R. 3685 -- (Senate - November 13, 2007)

[Page: S14237]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 3495) to establish a National Commission on Children and Disasters, and for other purposes.
A bill (H.R. 3685) to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings at this time, Mr. President.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
